description: Eight months into the pandemic, a sobering new timeline from Dr. Anthony Fauci: an FDA-approved vaccine by the end of the year or early 2021 and widespread vaccine distribution by mid-next year.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: California Gov. Newsom on wildfire devastation: Impact of climate change cannot be denied
description: As firefighters battle dozens of deadly wildfires across California, Governor Gavin Newsom warns that climate change is a fundamental part of the crisis. Fires along the West Coast have destroyed towns and forced tens of thousands of evacuations.
source.name: NBC News

author: Dareh Gregorian and The Associated Press
title: Democrat running against QAnon-supporting Republican in Georgia drops out of race
description: Kevin Van Ausdal's shock announcement appears to guarantee Marjorie Taylor Greene, who has a history of racist comments, will be elected to Congress in November
content:
The Democratic congressional candidate running against QAnon-supporting Republican Marjorie Taylor Greene in Georgia announced on Friday he was dropping out of the race.
The surprise announcement by… [+3355 chars]
source.name: NBC News

author: Sahil Kapur
title: Democratic insiders set up 'war room' to kill the filibuster
description: Former Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid told NBC News ending the 60-vote rule "should be the first item of business" if Democrats sweep the 2020 races.
content: WASHINGTON Democratic insiders are assembling a coalition behind the scenes to wage an all-out war on the Senate filibuster in bullish anticipation of sweeping the 2020 election and passing an ambiti… [+6650 chars]
source.name: NBC News
